title: üåä 8th Annual Irish Sea Level Meeting
text:
Maynooth University | Hybrid Format
This year‚Äôs Irish Sea Level Meeting brings together researchers to discuss recent advances in sea-level science and coastal impacts. Day 1 features a series of invited talks and presentations, while Day 2 provides hands-on, workshop-style sessions aimed at building tools and skills for sea-level research.

title: üåä 8th Annual Irish Sea Level Meeting
text:
üè´ Joining the Meeting
In-person:
School of Education, Room SE014, Maynooth University, Maynooth
Online:
Click here to join via Microsoft Teams

üìã Registration
To help us plan for catering ‚Äî and to receive updates ‚Äî
please register your interest on Eventbrite for either online or in-person attendance.

Registration is free.
Lunch and coffee breaks will be provided for registered in-person participants.
